customer_addr:

Crystal River, FL 34429

citations.narrative:
Multiple serval and caracal enclosures at the facility are less than three feet away from the perimeter fence.
Primary enclosures that are less than three feet away from the perimeter fence may allow unwanted contact between
animals inside the enclosure and people or animals outside the perimeter fence which could lead to injury or disease
spread. All perimeter fences must be of sufficient distance from the outside of the primary enclosure to prevent physical
contact between animals inside the enclosure and animals or persons outside the perimeter fence. Such fences less than
3 feet in distance from the primary enclosure must be approved in writing by the Administrator.
To be corrected by June 1, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.127(d) 
   
Facilities, outdoor. 
Multiple serval and caracal enclosures at the facility are less than three feet away from the perimeter fence.  
Primary enclosures that are less than three feet away from the perimeter fence may allow unwanted contact between 
animals inside the enclosure and people or animals outside the perimeter fence which could lead to injury or disease 
spread. All perimeter fences must be of sufficient distance from the outside of the primary enclosure to prevent physical 
contact between animals inside the enclosure and animals or persons outside the perimeter fence. Such fences less than 
3 feet in distance from the primary enclosure must be approved in writing by the Administrator.  
To be corrected by June 1, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
